example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (NP (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (ADVP (AD 隐隐)) (VP (VV 传来)))) (DEC 的))) (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (IP (NP-DIR (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (VA 隆隆)))) (NP (NN 机器) (NN 声))) (CC 和) (NP (DNP (NP (NN 商贩)) (DEG 的)) (IP-APP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VCD (VV 叫买) (VV 吆喝)))) (NP (NN 声)))) (PU ，) (VP (VV 划破) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (DNP (NP (NN 冬日)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 静寂)))))
example.arg: *OP* *T*-1 隐隐 传来 的 *OP* *T*-2 隆隆 机器 声 和 商贩 的 *PRO* 叫买 吆喝 声
